channel.title: Need help with adding item! pleasee!
channel.description:
hello i recently added a dragonfire shield, into my items and it says non existing therefore i listed it in my item.cfg as this,
item = 15185 Dragon_fire shield a silabsoft item 10000000 10000000 10000000 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 when i compile its fine, then i run server and get a error which is:
- NPS 3.1 - .. Online! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:346) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:28)
what do i do please may someone help , i am just learning coding so dont be harsh please lol thanks!

item.title: Need help with adding item! pleasee!
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

silabmods, did u even read the post?

item.title: Need help with adding item! pleasee!
item.dc:creator: @silabmods silabmods
item.description:
@silabmods wrote:

This is a example about item.cfg

item = 15344 zamorakian_spear zamorakian_spear. 39213.7902573678 39213.7902573678 50939.6721907541 55 55 55 0 0 5 5 5 5 5 60 0
[sup]39213.7902573678 39213.7902573678 50939.6721907541 are the buy price, sell price alch price[/sup]
After that you should open item4.java and find this:

public static int shields[] = { 11540, 6889, 3101,... < lots of numbers
and add there the code of your shield. if you dont add it the shield will be weared like a weapon not like a shield

This should work, just change the names you see in here and item ID and its done

Read full topic
